msbt.message: You know what I TOTALLY, TOTALLY love? Music shows on TV. There's all kinds to watch!Everyone on Love Star sings you guessed it! Love ballads.Screech Along is soooo metal! And everyone has the BEST hair.Beep Boot Deet Doop has all the best dance music! <10_4 />I jump around my living room whenever it's on!Fancy Freestyling is where the rap stars of tomorrow make their debut. I can't rap very well, but I always try.With these shows, I get to hear new musicand I get to be even more inspired to be a superstar!
If I ever get the chance to be on Love Star, I'm going to sing the best love ballad of all time!I want to help folks fall in love with my singing!<10_4 /> And with each other!

If I ever got the chance to be on Screech Along, I'd scream the roof off the place!<10_10 />I WAS A TRÈS CHIC GAL ON AN ISLAND!NOW I'M A METAL STAR! EVERYBODY GET DOWN!<10_9 />Whew! Rock on, ! I'm ! GOOD NIGHT EVERYBODY!

If I ever got the chance to be on Beep Boot Deet Doop, I'd dance and sing!I'd say, "DJ! Start a song!" and then I'd be all singing like, "Boop diddle oody boop!" and I'd dance andHeh EractuallyI totally forgot to sign up for dance lessons!Need to get on that.
If I was asked to go on Fancy Freestyle, I would freak OUT. I mean it. Total loss of control.Because I have no clue how to rap. <10_4 />I spent my skill points on other stats!
When it comes to the world of fab fashion, what do you think is the most important part of being stylish?

It's individuality, DUH! You have to show off what makes you different from everybody else! Me and hit the shops the other day, and didn't like anything I picked out. Boo! I went with my gut, though! I bought something to show off my individuality!Everybody should be like that! Show the world you're like no one else!
It's being trendy, !But who exactly decides the trends, anyway? You know what? I decide!The next design I make could be the next big fashion trend. So get ready, fashion world!

Fashion is sodeep. It's like philosophy, but with fabric! And sometimes sequins.Some folks' philosophy is that they need to wear exactly what everyone else does.Me? I'd rather define fashion than just follow it! Don't worry about other folks! Wear what you like!
I wonder how they make the outside of a crepe so super soft and yummy?I bet you could put anything in a crepe. Like, , maybe? Might be delish!

I've been thinking a lot about sweet food today. And at first, it was just a sweet-tooth craving kind of thingThen I had a crazy idea! Sweet is goodbut what if you also had spicy?! We put the two together!Mixing spicy with sweet? Nobody's ever done that! I'm a food genius!I'm going to be the first singer- songwriter celebrity chef!
Cake is so fluffy and delicious that you just want to eat it all at once!Wouldn't it be nice if there was some way to slow folks down while they eat it?
Did you know I'm basically a beach- volleyball pro, ? We should hit the beach and play!
Sure!
Sounds fun!
No, thanks.
Yeah, ! I knew you'd agree! You're the best!Having fun right next to the ocean? It's like all the little things that bother me just go away!

Ohmigosh, right?! You BETTER watch out for my spin serve!It's not like I'm, you know, super athletic or anything—I save my energy for my music career—butdoing your best at something you're really into is kind of what life is all about, right?
For real?! You don't want to play? 'K, you can cheer me on!OH! Make a really cool banner that says "Go !" on it. That'll be fab!
Did you know that I have a pet?
It's a pill bug named !If you poke , she rolls up into a ball! SO adorbs!But IS a pill bug, and kind of gross when she's not a ballso I gave her a WAY cute name!
Oh, I never told you? Her name is and she's a horned dynastid!I caught her when she was fighting with another bug!I named her so no one will want to fight with her since she's so lovable!
Her name is and she's a stag beetle!When I caught her, she pinched my hand and it hurt SO bad!'s kind of a jerk, but she has a sweet name, so maybe it'll make her sweet!
We could useI don't know cayenne pepper? <10_4 />What do you think? I bet it'd be delicious!
So, maybe you could use red pepper flakes? I LOVE them on pizza.What do you think? I bet they'd be good!
We could totally usejalapeños! What do you think? I bet they'd go really great together!
At first I thought, "Folks need to learn self-control." But then I thought, "Mmm, cake." SoI'm out for cake.
Maybe you could use, likehard candy! It's still, you know, super sweet, but not very easy to eat!Yeah! That'll slow everybody down and let them enjoy their cake! I need to try that!

Maybe you could use, likeum rocks!<10_4 /> Which is a terrible idea now that I've said it out loud.But I can sell it! Lots of it.Eat your cake too fast? Try ROCKS! Simply place ROCKS Brand rocks in your cake, and crunch your way to HA! It's even worse when I try to sell it.

As a soon-to-be singer-songwriter producer multi-hyphenate, I need to get my brand out there!Help me out, ! Can you caaasually spread some fab rumors about me?Viral marketing is so totally a thing that folks maybe still use in . Well, I want some!Just tell folks stuff like, "Hey, you know ? She's a total virus!"They're bound to remember me!

Did you hear the latest rumor about me and a certainmovie star?No? Hmmm I must not be spreading the rumor well enough.I want folks to think I'm friends with someone famous. That way I'll be more interesting!I'm already interesting? Are you trying to get on my good side, ? <10_4 />It's working!
